column4: seems something happen to my Intel 946GZ Express family chipset, i cant install ubuntu. any suggestion? its work good with XP and previusoly i installed ubuntu on same video card..... when i update the ubuntu OS with latest updates from the internet, and shutdown the pc, after that ubuntu never start again, so i m now try to install ubuntu again
its simply reject to enter into LIVE CD and show a black screen , says type HELP for more commands
its crashed thats why i want to install it again
i installed updates for uuntu and after that it never starts
but ubuntu was installed on the same machine 2 days before, and after installing updates of ubuntu, its crashed and never recover, so i tried to install ubuntu again
plz guys help me to install ubuntu again
when you said it didn't start,you mean it cannot start x or what
it cant start temperary ubuntu session from there a user can decide to install it or not...
tell us how do you install,from a cd,vm or not,a livecd or alternate cd
no ,where is your computer at,i mean at what stage
nothing happend, i wait for 30 minutes but still the same black screen " type help for more help commands"
have you use that cd installed ubuntu successfully
i tried 4 ubuntu CD's and facing same problem :(
